name: Military Academy
context: These advanced military tablets were discovered in the ruins of what appears to be an officer training facility. The complex featured tactical planning rooms, weapons testing grounds, and strategic studies chambers. The tablets contain sophisticated military doctrine, advanced tactics, and leadership training materials.
